Recent Game Development Projects

Space Invader Game

Aug 18, 2023
Space_Invader is a python game where the users have to shoot the enemies aircraft without they invading the user's territory. It was built with the help of PyGame library and in the practice of Objected Oriented Programming.

Pong Game

Aug 17, 2023
Pong Game is a two players game where users have to shoot the ball into other's players territory. It was built in the practice of using PyGame and Object Oriented Programming.

Sudoku Game

Jul 18, 2023
Sudoku Game is a number game where user have to put different number horizontally, vertically and diagagonally both in the big boxes and small boxes. This project was built in the practice of PyGame and Objected Oriented Programming in Python.
Recent Web Applicatioin Projects
Travel Assistance Website
React.JS
Web design
API Implementation
JavaScript

This website is created to help people find the restaurants, hotels and tourist attractions. It is built in the practice of implementing API with React application. This include TravelAdvisorApi and OpenWeatherMap API.

FindingJobs_MobileApplication
React Native
API Implementation
Expo_App

This is a mobile application building with the help of Expo App and React Native. It is built in the practice of using React Native Components and implementing JSearchAPI.

Chat_Application
React Js
Chat Engine
Authentication

Chat_Application project is built to practice the logic of sending messages from one user to another user in real time. It is built with the help of ChatEngine. We send text messages and pictures and people can receive it in real time. There's also a login form for user to login their credentials.
